events: {'planets': {'Aeth Minora': {'event_text': 'Placeholder event text', 'success_number': 69, 'type': 'science'}, 'Exoeth Prime': {'event_text': 'Placeholder event text', 'success_number': 42, 'type': 'science'}, 'Neb Betaon': {'event_text': 'Placeholder event text', 'success_number': 42, 'type': 'combat'}, 'Terra Prime Major': {'event_text': 'Placeholder event text', 'success_number': 59, 'type': 'combat'}}, 'system': {'event_text': "As the Starship Enterprise descended into Aeth Prime Prime's atmosphere, the crew braced themselves for a diplomatic encounter that would determine the fate of two civilizations.\n\nWith tension hanging in the air and the potential for intergalactic conflict, Captain Picard prepared to negotiate peace at Aeth Prime Prime.", 'success_number': 77, 'type': 'diplomacy'}}

intro_text: The Alpha Centauri system is a star system located in the Alpha Centauri constellation, approximately 4.3 light-years away from Earth. It consists of three stars Alpha Centauri A, Alpha Centauri B, and Alpha Centauri C (also known as Proxima Centauri).
